thread.title: Lenovo Vibe Shot Coming to India on September 22
thread.title_full: Lenovo Vibe Shot Coming to India on September 22 - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Lenovo Vibe Shot Coming to India on September 22
text: Lenovo unveiled its camera-centric phone Vibe Shot earlier this year, but customers in India haven't been able to purchase one for the moment. The good news is that's about to change since Lenovo has just announced the Vibe Shot will be introduced in India on September 22, a new report confirms. The Chinese company recently confirmed it has scheduled a laun... Â»
